## CollectionModule.getOwned() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

`getOwned` is a convenience method for getting all owned tokens for a particular wallet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getOwned(_address?: string): Promise<CollectionMetadata[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_address | string | The address to check for token ownership |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[CollectionMetadata](./sdk.collectionmetadata.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

An array of CollectionMetadata objects that are owned by the address
